name: Solitaire (itch) (Vircon32)
description:
This is mostly the classic card solitaire, but with more arcade-like graphics and featuring music and sound. A full deck of pixel-art cards has been drawn for this version!

This version is based on the hard setting: 3 cards are drawn at a time. Also, be aware that not all games will be winnable! This will depend on the deck shuffling that you get each time.

This is a game for Vircon32 game console (you can learn about it at its website). This game is open source, you can find the sources at the website or browse the code directly on GitHub.
